subject: Blacks
Race and Ethnicity
Television
lead_paragraph: ESPN had thought about creating a site about race for a while but a meeting in 2013 between Jason Whitlock and John Skipper, the president of ESPN, persuaded Skipper to hand the job to Whitlock.
snippet: ESPN had thought about creating a site about race for a while but a meeting in 2013 between Jason Whitlock and John Skipper, the president of ESPN, persuaded Skipper to hand the job to Whitlock.
